title: Best of CCK: The New King Of New York
description:
Steve Cohen is here, and he is perfect. The Mets have a new owner and KFC is, maybe, happy? Clem calls in to celebrate. Mets callers to speculate on how many championships we will win. Will Bobby Bonilla get a raise? Will there be a shark at Citifield? Anything is possible with Steve Cohen in town.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
